name: Uncharted Dreams - Fate of the Miniatures
name_original: Uncharted Dreams - Fate of the Miniatures
description:
@FranklinsGhost

Made for Ludum Dare 38

You go to sleep and each night it's the same Dream. You find yourself in your room waking up, but at such a minute scale that you become disoriented. What are you meant to do? Where are you meant to go?

Inspired by me playing Uncharted 4 lately and the way you have to click a button at times to interact with things and progress.

Controls:

X/SPACE - to interact

Z - to run
